nodes.id: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

zh-cn: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会
en: 20th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党的一次重要会议，以赫鲁晓夫发表批判斯大林个人崇拜的“秘密报告”而闻名，是苏联及国际共产主义历史的重要转折点。
description.en: A significant congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, famous for Nikita Khrushchev's "Secret Speech" criticizing Joseph Stalin's cult of personality, marking a major turning point in Soviet and international communist history.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，在苏共二十大期间担任苏共中央第一书记，发表了否定斯大林的“秘密报告”。
description.en: A Soviet statesman who served as the First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union during the 20th Congress and delivered the "Secret Speech" denouncing Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 苏联前领导人，其个人崇拜和独裁统治在苏共二十大上受到赫鲁晓夫的严厉批判。
description.en: Former leader of the Soviet Union whose cult of personality and dictatorial rule were severely criticized by Khrushchev at the 20th Congress of the CPSU.

nodes.id: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

zh-cn: 关于个人崇拜及其后果
en: On the Cult of Personality and Its Consequences

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大最后一天所作的报告，全盘否定了斯大林，揭露了苏联大量负面情况。
description.en: A report delivered by Khrushchev on the last day of the 20th Congress of the CPSU, which comprehensively repudiated Stalin and exposed numerous negative aspects of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 波兰统一工人党中央第一书记，在出席苏共二十大后，因阅读赫鲁晓夫的秘密报告而突发心肌梗塞去世。
description.en: First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Polish United Workers' Party, who died of a heart attack after attending the 20th Congress of the CPSU and reading Khrushchev's secret speech.

description.zh-cn: 波兰人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Polish People's Republic.

description.zh-cn: 一种将个人（通常是政治领袖）神化和绝对化的社会政治现象，是苏共二十大重点批判的对象。
description.en: A socio-political phenomenon of deifying and absolutizing an individual (usually a political leader), which was a key target of criticism at the 20th Congress of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大上提出的外交政策理论，包含“和平共处”、“和平竞赛”、“和平过渡”三项主张。
description.en: A foreign policy doctrine proposed by Khrushchev at the 20th Congress of the CPSU, comprising the three principles of "peaceful coexistence," "peaceful competition," and "peaceful transition."

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。在苏共二十大后，其与苏共的路线分歧逐渐加剧。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China. After the 20th Congress of the CPSU, its line differences with the CPSU gradually intensified.

description.zh-cn: 阿尔巴尼亚的执政党，在苏共二十大后公开反对赫鲁晓夫的修正主义观点。
description.en: The ruling party of Albania, which openly opposed Khrushchev's revisionist views after the 20th Congress of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国与苏联之间自1950年代末开始的政治、意识形态对立及关系恶化。
description.en: Refers to the political and ideological confrontation and deterioration of relations between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union, beginning in the late 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 在苏共二十大批判斯大林后，于斯大林故乡格鲁吉亚爆发的大规模示威游行，后遭苏联军队镇压。
description.en: Large-scale demonstrations that broke out in Stalin's homeland of Georgia after the 20th Congress of the CPSU criticized him, which were later suppressed by the Soviet army.

en: Polish October and Hungarian Revolution of 1956

description.zh-cn: 指1956年在波兰和匈牙利发生的反对苏联控制和斯大林主义模式的政治动荡事件。
description.en: Refers to the political turmoil in Poland and Hungary in 1956 against Soviet control and the Stalinist model.

description.zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟，一个存在于1922年至1991年的欧亚大陆北部的联邦制社会主义国家。
description.en: The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics, a federal socialist state in Northern Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 苏联的国家军事力量。
description.en: The national military forces of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。他曾指出苏共二十大的重要功绩是揭示了个人神化的严重后果。
description.en: The paramount leader of the second generation of the Communist Party of China's leadership. He noted that an important achievement of the 20th Congress of the CPSU was revealing the serious consequences of deifying an individual.

description.zh-cn: 苏联在赫鲁晓夫领导下的一段时期，期间斯大林主义受到批判，审查制度有所放松，数百万政治犯从古拉格获释。
description.en: A period under Khrushchev's leadership in the Soviet Union during which Stalinism was criticized, censorship was relaxed, and millions of political prisoners were released from the Gulag.

description.zh-cn: 匈牙利共产党领导人，在苏共二十大后，因苏共压力被迫下台。
description.en: Leader of the Hungarian Communist Party who was forced to step down under pressure from the CPSU after the 20th Congress.

description.zh-cn: 1956年10月在匈牙利爆发的全国性反政府革命，其背景与苏共二十大的去斯大林化运动有关。
description.en: A nationwide anti-government revolution that broke out in Hungary in October 1956, its context was related to the de-Stalinization movement of the 20th Congress of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 戈尔巴乔夫提出的外交政策理论，其理论依据来源于“三和路线”。
description.en: A foreign policy doctrine proposed by Gorbachev, whose theoretical basis originated from the "Three Peacefuls" line.

description.zh-cn: 苏联最后一任最高领导人，其“新思维外交”理论受到苏共二十大“三和路线”的影响。
description.en: The last supreme leader of the Soviet Union, whose "New Thinking" foreign policy was influenced by the "Three Peacefuls" line from the 20th Congress of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 美国第35任总统，曾与赫鲁晓夫在维也纳会面并有电文往来。
description.en: The 35th President of the United States, who met with Khrushchev in Vienna and exchanged messages with him.

relationships.source: 尼基塔·赫鲁晓夫

description.zh-cn: 在苏共二十大期间，尼基塔·赫鲁晓夫担任苏联共产党中央委员会第一书记。
description.en: During the 20th Congress of the CPSU, Nikita Khrushchev served as the First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

relationships.source: 博莱斯瓦夫·贝鲁特

position.en: First Secretary of the Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 博莱斯瓦夫·贝鲁特是波兰统一工人党中央第一书记。
description.en: Bolesław Bierut was the First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Polish United Workers' Party.

relationships.source: 尼基塔·赫鲁晓夫
relationships.target: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 尼基塔·赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大最后一天作了题为《关于个人崇拜及其后果》的秘密报告。
description.en: Nikita Khrushchev delivered the secret report titled "On the Cult of Personality and Its Consequences" on the last day of the 20th Congress of the CPSU.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 该报告全盘否定了约瑟夫·斯大林，严厉批判其个人崇拜、独裁统治及所犯的错误。
description.en: The report comprehensively repudiated Joseph Stalin, severely criticizing his cult of personality, dictatorial rule, and the mistakes he made.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 该报告的核心内容之一是批判与马克思主义不相容的个人崇拜现象。
description.en: One of the core contents of the report was the criticism of the cult of personality phenomenon, which is incompatible with Marxism.

relationships.source: 关于个人崇拜及其后果

description.zh-cn: 波兰领导人博莱斯瓦夫·贝鲁特在读完该秘密报告后突发心肌梗塞去世。
description.en: Polish leader Bolesław Bierut died of a heart attack after reading the secret report.

relationships.source: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫在苏共二十大的总结报告上，针对当时的国际形势，提出了“三和路线”。
description.en: In his concluding report at the 20th Congress of the CPSU, Khrushchev proposed the "Three Peacefuls" line in response to the international situation at the time.

relationships.source: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 苏共二十大对斯大林的批判直接引发了在其故乡格鲁吉亚的大规模抗议示威。
description.en: The criticism of Stalin at the 20th Congress of the CPSU directly triggered large-scale protest demonstrations in his homeland of Georgia.

relationships.source: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 苏共二十大的去斯大林化对东欧产生了巨大冲击，是引发波匈事件的重要背景因素。
description.en: The de-Stalinization of the 20th Congress of the CPSU had a huge impact on Eastern Europe and was an important background factor that triggered the events in Poland and Hungary.

relationships.source: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 苏共二十大提出的路线被中国共产党等认为是修正主义，成为后来中苏关系恶化的重要开端。
description.en: The line proposed by the 20th Congress of the CPSU was considered revisionist by the Communist Party of China and others, becoming a significant starting point for the subsequent deterioration of Sino-Soviet relations.

relationships.source: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 苏共二十大对斯大林的批判和对个人崇拜的否定，正式开启了“赫鲁晓夫解冻”时期。
description.en: The criticism of Stalin and the rejection of the cult of personality at the 20th Congress of the CPSU officially initiated the period of the "Khrushchev Thaw".

relationships.source: 苏联武装力量

description.zh-cn: 苏联当局动用军队镇压了因批判斯大林而引发的格鲁吉亚示威，造成人员伤亡。
description.en: Soviet authorities used the armed forces to suppress the demonstrations in Georgia, which were triggered by the criticism of Stalin, resulting in casualties.

relationships.source: 苏联

description.zh-cn: 在波匈事件中，苏联政府出动坦克镇压了匈牙利的革命。
description.en: During the Polish-Hungarian events, the Soviet government dispatched tanks to suppress the revolution in Hungary.

relationships.source: 中国共产党

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党认为苏共二十大开启了修正主义，双方分歧加剧，最终导致关系公开破裂和中苏交恶。
description.en: The Communist Party of China believed that the 20th Congress of the CPSU initiated revisionism, which exacerbated the differences between the two parties, eventually leading to an open rupture in relations and the Sino-Soviet split.

relationships.source: 阿尔巴尼亚劳动党

description.zh-cn: 阿尔巴尼亚劳动党在苏共二十大后立即开始了反对赫鲁晓夫领导层修正主义观点的斗争。
description.en: Immediately after the 20th Congress of the CPSU, the Party of Labour of Albania began its struggle against the revisionist views of Khrushchev's leadership.

relationships.source: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 邓小平认为苏共二十大的一个重要功绩是“告诉我们，把个人神化会引发多么严重的后果”，影响了他的政治思想。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping believed that a significant merit of the 20th Congress of the CPSU was that it "told us what serious consequences can be brought about by the deification of an individual," which influenced his political thought.

relationships.source: 三和路线

description.zh-cn: 戈尔巴乔夫提出的“新思维外交”的理论依据来源于苏共二十大上提出的“三和路线”。
description.en: The theoretical basis for Gorbachev's "New Thinking" foreign policy originated from the "Three Peacefuls" line proposed at the 20th Congress of the CPSU.

relationships.source: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 苏共二十大后，匈牙利领导人拉科西·马加什因对去斯大林化阳奉阴违，在苏共压力下被迫下台。
description.en: After the 20th Congress of the CPSU, Hungarian leader Mátyás Rákosi was forced to step down under Soviet pressure for his passive resistance to de-Stalinization.

relationships.source: 苏联共产党第二十次代表大会

description.zh-cn: 苏共二十大后的去斯大林化运动以及在匈牙利造成的人事变动，是引发1956年匈牙利革命的重要因素。
description.en: The de-Stalinization movement following the 20th Congress of the CPSU and the resulting personnel changes in Hungary were important factors that triggered the Hungarian Revolution of 1956.

relationships.source: 尼基塔·赫鲁晓夫

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫与美国总统约翰·肯尼迪于1961年在维也纳会面，并有电文往来，讨论美苏合作。
description.en: Khrushchev met with US President John F. Kennedy in Vienna in 1961 and exchanged messages to discuss US-Soviet cooperation.
